abstractText: This document is the Environmental Assessment Program (EAP) Water Quality Studies Unit Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Monitoring Total Dissolved Gas (TDG) in Freshwater.This SOP should be followed for all monitoring of TDG in freshwater. It includes procedures for spot measurements and long-term continuous monitoring of TDG pressure, and the measurement of barometric pressure data to allow calculations of TDG as percent of saturation.
title: Standard Operating Procedure for Monitoring Total Dissolved Gas in Freshwater v1.0
